description: Sometimes we Moblins find the best junk ever! Shiny Rupees, Handy Metal, sometimes even a few scrap of week old meat!
tooltip: Sometimes we Moblins find the best junk ever! Shiny Rupees, Handy Metal, sometimes even a few scrap of week old meat! (Big Bone Pits periodically generate a load of Material, Ore, or Rupees instead of spawning a Scrap Pile)
